info.title: Journey API
info.description: The public API documentation for the Journey web application.

get.description: Returns the user's non-sensitive account information.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be GET

post.description: Attempts to login and return with a cookie.

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

get.summary: Logout by returning with expired cookie
get.description: Sets the HTTP-only cookie as expired, which deauthenticates the user.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be GET

post.description: Inserts account details into db (if email isn't already taken), and returns with a cookie.

requestBody.description: Email must not already be taken. Password must be in plaintext.

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

post.description: Update account info with provided data.

requestBody.description: Non-null fields will update that field. Null fields will not update that field.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

get.summary: Whether the user has a valid auth-token
get.description: Returns 200 if token is valid, or 401 if invalid or nonexistant.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be GET

get.description: Fetches a list of all chat session IDs belonging to the user.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be GET

post.summary: Fetch a page of messages from a chat session
post.description: If no message id is provided, this fetches the latest messages from the chat session. If a message id is provided, that message and messages preceeding it will be fetched.

requestBody.description: Message id may be omitted to get the latest messages

Latest Messages.summary: Fetch the latest messages from a chat session

Specific Messages.summary: Fetch a specific page of messages from a chat session

Latest Messages.summary: The latest messages from a chat session

Specific Messages.summary: A specific page of messages from a chat session

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

get.summary: Get the chat session id for an empty chat
get.description: Creates a new empty chat session for this user if one doesn't already exist, and returns its chat session id.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be GET

post.description: Fetches the progress of the llm pipeline for this chat session.

requestBody.description: Chat session ID must belong to the user who sent the request. New Title must not be empty string.

200.description: The status of the LLM pipeline for the quested chat session

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: Chat session not found for this user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

post.description: Renames a chat session that belongs to this user with the given ID to the given title.

requestBody.description: Chat session ID must belong to the user who sent the request. New Title must not be empty string.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: Chat session not found for this user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

post.summary: Send a message and wait for a reply from the LLM
post.description: Ask the LLM to generate an itinerary and it should respond with one.

requestBody.description: Itinerary id is optional and is used to give context to the LLM.

200.description: Message sent, and LLM replied successfully

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: Chat session not found for this user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

post.summary: Update the text of a message and wait for a reply from the LLM
post.description: Updating a message deletes all proceeding messages, updates the text of the given message, and returns a response from the LLM.

requestBody.description: Itinerary id is optional and is used to give context to the LLM.

200.description: Message updated, and LLM replied successfully

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: Message not found in this chat session for this user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

delete.description: Deletes a chat session and its associated messages and unsaved, private itineraries if it belongs to the user making the request.

200.description: Chat session and associated messages and unsaved, private itineraries deleted successfully

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: Chat session not found for this user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be DELETE

post.summary: Save a new or update an existing itinerary
post.description: If the itinerary id is already saved for this user, it's updated with the provided values. Otherwise a new one is created.

requestBody.description: The itinerary to save for the user.

200.description: The id of the itinerary that was just saved. It may be the same as the id passed in the request.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

get.summary: Fetch all the saved itineraries from this user
get.description: Fetches all the itineraries from this user that are marked as saved.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be GET

get.description: Fetches the specified itinerary if it belongs to this user or is public.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be GET

post.summary: Search for events with the given filters and return a list of the best matching events
post.description: Returns a limited number of events that best match the filters provided in the request.

requestBody.description: Uses the filters, if provided, to search for the best matching events.

200.description: A list of the best matching events for the given filters.

events.event_description: Annual music festival in the park

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

post.description: Sets the saved field to false for the given itinerary. Verifies the itinerary belongs to the user.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: Itinerary not found or doesn't belong to user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

post.summary: Insert or update a user-created custom event
post.description: Insert a new or updates an existing user-created event with the values passed in the request, returning the event id.

requestBody.description: If id is provided, the event will be updated, otherwise it is inserted. The event name is required.

example.event_description: I want to do something and it's easier to make a custom event than to tell the LLM exactly how I want it.

200.description: Contains the id of the event that was just inserted or updated.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: User-event not found for this user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

delete.summary: Deletes a user-event from the DB
delete.description: Deletes the user-created event from the DB using the provided event ID. Event must have been created by this user.

401.description: User has an invalid cookie/no cookie

404.description: User-event not found or does not belong to this user

405.description: Method Not Allowed - Must be POST

BudgetBucket.description:
Budget preference enum mapped to Postgres `budget_bucket`.
Used in account preferences and returned by account APIs.
- Fields:
  - Enum variants representing budget bands

title.description: Name of chat for user context

chat_sessions.description: chat session ids belonging to the user who made the request

CurrentResponse.description:
API route response for GET `/api/account/current`.
- Safe-to-return account profile for current user

disabilities.description:
Optional food and allergies preferences
should this have option encoded...

food_allergies.description:
Optional food and allergies preferences
should this have option encoded...

Event.description: A single event without context from an itinerary

block_index.description: Must be some to guarantee ordering

timezone.description: Timezone of hard start and hard end

EventDay.description: A single day of events in an itinerary

afternoon_events.description: All the events taking place in the afternoon

date.description: The date of this day within the range of itinerary start and end dates (Destination's local timezone - %Y-%m-%d)

evening_events.description: All the events taking place in the evening

morning_events.description: All the events taking place in the morning

Itinerary.description: A complete itinerary with event details

chat_session_id.description: Possible associated chat session for easy editing on frontend

end_date.description: UTC date that the last event may take place (%Y-%m-%d)

event_days.description:
List of days containing events for that day
* Days are guaranteed to be sorted in chronological order

start_date.description: UTC date that the first event may take place (%Y-%m-%d)

title.description: Title of itinerary, defaults to include location and date range

unassigned_events.description: Events that are not assigned to any specific time slot

LlmProgress.description: The status of the LLM pipeline

password.description: Plaintext password submitted by the user

Message.description: A message in a chat session

is_user.description: Whether the message was sent by a user or generated by the LLM

itinerary_id.description: Possible itinerary associated with this message

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp this message was sent (%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S)

chat_session_id.description: chat session to fetch page from

message_id.description:
Possible message id to represent the end of the page
* If Some, it will fetch this message and consecutive previous messages in chronological order
* If None, it will fetch the latest consecutive messages from the chat session in chronological order

message_page.description: A page of messages guaranteed to be sorted in chronological order

prev_message_id.description: The id of the message that comes chronologically before the first message in message_page, if it exists

chat_session_id.description: this chat session is guaranteed to not have any messages in it

RiskTolerence.description:
Risk tolerance enum mapped to Postgres `risk_tolerence`.
Used in account preferences and returned by account APIs.
- Fields:
  - Enum variants representing risk appetite

id.description:
id of the itinerary that was just saved
* May be the same as the itinerary id passed in the request

itineraries.description: List of saved itineraries for the user.

SearchEventRequest.description:
A set of query filters to search for an event in the DB.

## Example
If event_name is provided, it will query the DB with something like this:
```sql
SELECT * FROM events
WHERE name LIKE $1
LIMIT 10;
```

chat_session_id.description: The chat session to send this message in. It must belong to the user making the request.

itinerary_id.description: A possible itinerary to give context to the LLM

bot_message.description: The response message from the LLM

user_message_id.description: The newly-created id of the message you just sent

SignupRequest.description:
Request payload for POST `/api/account/signup`.
Validated server-side before insert.

password.description: Plaintext password submitted by the user

itinerary_id.description: A possible itinerary to give context to the LLM

message_id.description: ID of the message to update. This message must belong to a chat session which belongs to the user who made the request

new_text.description: The text to replace the old content with

UpdateRequest.description:
Request payload for POST `/api/account/update`.
- Only `Some` fields are updated.

current_password.description: Current password (required if password is being updated)

disabilities.description:
Optional new disabilites
* String is a comma-separated list of preferences

food_allergies.description:
Optional new food and allergies preferences
* String is a comma-separated list of preferences

UpdateResponse.description:
API route response for POST `/api/account/update`.
- Contains full updated account profile for convenience.

disabilities.description:
Optional disabilites
* String is a comma-separated list of preferences

food_allergies.description:
Optional food and allergies preferences
* String is a comma-separated list of preferences

UserEventRequest.description: A user-created event. It must have a name, and all other fields are optional.

id.description: If id is provided, it updates the user-event with that id. Otherwise it creates the event.

timezone.description: Timezone of hard start and hard end

set-cookie.name: auth-token
set-cookie.description: An HTTP-only cookie which must encode a valid account id, expiration timestamp, and other information
